opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Jones, on Behalf of Herself and a Class of Others Similarly Situated v. R. R. Donnelley & Sons Co

opinion:
540 U.S. 1014

JONES ET AL., ON BEHALF OF HERSELF AND A CLASS OF OTHERS SIMILARLY SITUATED
v.
R. R. DONNELLEY & SONS CO.

No. 02-1205.

Supreme Court of United States.

November 17, 2003.

1

Appeal from the C. A. 7th Cir. [Certiorari granted, 538 U. S. 1030.]

2

Motion of respondent and Alabama for leave to allow Alabama to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument granted.
